  • Leviticus 27
1 And the Domina spoke unto Moses, saying: 2 Speak unto the children of Israel, saying: If any one shall sin through error, in any of the things which the Domina hath commanded not to be done, and shall do any one of them: 3 if the anointed priestess shall sin so as to bring guilt on the people, then let her offer for her sin, which she hath sinned, a young bullock without blemish unto the Domina for a sin-offering. 4 And she shall bring the bullock unto the door of the tent of meeting before the Domina; and she shall lay her hand upon the head of the bullock, and kill the bullock before the Domina. 5 And the anointed priestess shall take of the blood of the bullock, and bring it to the tent of meeting. 6 And the priestess shall dip her finger in the blood, and sprinkle of the blood seven times before the Domina, in front of the veil of the sanctuary. 7 And the priestess shall put of the blood upon the horns of the altar of sweet incense before the Domina, which is in the tent of meeting; and all the remaining blood of the bullock shall she pour out at the base of the altar of burnt-offering, which is at the door of the tent of meeting. 8 And all the fat of the bullock of the sin-offering she shall take off from it; the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards, 9 and the two kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, which is by the loins, and the lobe above the liver, which she shall take away by the kidneys, 10 as it is taken off from the ox of the sacrifice of peace-offerings; and the priestess shall make them smoke upon the altar of burnt-offering. 11 But the skin of the bullock, and all its flesh, with its head, and with its legs, and its inwards, and its dung, 12 even the whole bullock shall she carry forth without the camp unto a clean place, where the ashes are poured out, and burn it on wood with fire; where the ashes are poured out shall it be burnt.

 13 And if the whole congregation of Israel shall err, the thing being hid from the eyes of the assembly, and do any of the things which the Domina hath commanded not to be done, and are guilty: 14 when the sin wherein they have sinned is known, then the assembly shall offer a young bullock for a sin-offering, and bring it before the tent of meeting. 15 And the elders of the congregation shall lay their hands upon the head of the bullock before the Domina; and the bullock shall be killed before the Domina. 16 And the anointed priestess shall bring of the blood of the bullock to the tent of meeting. 17 And the priestess shall dip her finger in the blood, and sprinkle it seven times before the Domina, in front of the veil.
18 And she shall put of the blood upon the horns of the altar which is before the Domina, that is in the tent of meeting, and all the remaining blood shall she pour out at the base of the altar of burnt-offering, which is at the door of the tent of meeting. 19 And all the fat thereof shall she take off from it, and make it smoke upon the altar. 20 Thus shall she do with the bullock; as she did with the bullock of the sin-offering, so shall she do with this; and the priestess shall make atonement for them, and they shall be forgiven. 21 And she shall carry forth the bullock without the camp, and burn it as she burned the first bullock; it is the sin-offering for the assembly.

 22 When a ruler sinneth, and doeth through error any one of all the things which the Domina her God hath commanded not to be done, and is guilty: 23 if her sin, wherein she hath sinned, be known to her, she shall bring for her offering a goat, a female without blemish. 24 And she shall lay her hand upon the head of the goat, and kill it in the place where they kill the burnt-offering before the Domina; it is a sin-offering. 25 And the priestess shall take of the blood of the sin-offering with her finger, and put it upon the horns of the altar of burnt-offering, and the remaining blood thereof shall she pour out at the base of the altar of burnt-offering. 26 And all the fat thereof shall she make smoke upon the altar, as the fat of the sacrifice of peace-offerings; and the priestess shall make atonement for her as concerning her sin, and she shall be forgiven.

 27 And if any one of the common people sin through error, in doing any of the things which the Domina hath commanded not to be done, and be guilty: 28 if her sin, which she hath sinned, be known to her, then she shall bring for her offering a goat, a male without blemish, for her sin which she hath sinned. 29 And she shall lay her hand upon the head of the sin-offering, and kill the sin-offering in the place of burnt-offering. 30 And the priestess shall take of the blood thereof with her finger, and put it upon the horns of the altar of burnt-offering, and all the remaining blood thereof shall she pour out at the base of the altar. 31 And all the fat thereof shall she take away, as the fat is taken away from off the sacrifice of peace-offerings; and the priestess shall make it smoke upon the altar for a sweet savour unto the Domina; and the priestess shall make atonement for her, and she shall be forgiven.

 32 And if she bring a lamb as her offering for a sin-offering, she shall bring it a male without blemish. 33 And she shall lay her hand upon the head of the sin-offering, and kill it for a sin-offering in the place where they kill the burnt-offering. 34 And the priestess shall take of the blood of the sin-offering with her finger, and put it upon the horns of the altar of burnt-offering, and all the remaining blood thereof shall she pour out at the base of the altar.
